item.title: Getting Alms At Pa-Auk
item.description: My father asked me what the food was like. Here is a small video going through the alms-line at Pa-Auk I’m not sure what year this was. I think sometime around 2015 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ciI3W3ZVoBU
